english: The Prophet (ﷺ) said, 'The strong is not the one who overcomes people by his strength, but the strong is the one who controls himself while in anger.'
arabic: ليس الشديد بالصرعة، إنما الشديد الذي يملك نفسه عند الغضب

english: None of you truly believes until he loves for his brother what he loves for himself.
arabic: لا يؤمن أحدكم حتى يحب لأخيه ما يحب لنفسه
